column8: ["I bought this phone, liked it, ordered another one for someone, and then the first one stopped working with a blank screen just past the return deadline! I have a picture of the blank screen, but looks like I can't attach it here... good for the merchant!", "Phone is very good for elders to use. Built quality is not good and very cheap plastic used including the side keys. No options given memory card management. I installed a memory card which has songs already but not able to see in media player. For changing the settings we have to * and # for toogling between options. For making calls it's good for elderly because of the keys.", "I have ordered the second time this model after 5 years. Previous model had less keys than this model. This one is a sophisticated phone for elderly people.\nPro: This time they included two new keys M1 & M2 for dedicated modifications.\nCon: This time they removed speed dial number 5 from editable option and kept it for speed dial. I don't know why they kept additional speed dial number when we have SOS option already in phone back panel."]

column2: Lava Pulse1- with contactless Talking Thermometer  (Rose Gold)
column5: ['32 MB RAM | 32 MB ROM | Expandable Upto 32 GB', '6.1 cm (2.4 inch) Display', '0.3MP Rear Camera', '1800 mAh Lithium-ion Battery']
column6: Bring home the Pulse 1 mobile phone from the house of Lava and experience the first-ever contactless talking thermometer. This mobile phone allows you to check your body temperature without having to touch the sensor. All you need to do is place the back of your hand or your forehead a few centimetres close to the sensor and it instantly reveals your body temperature on the screen. Moreover, this phone saves up to 10 readings for future references and shares the data via messages.

column6:
You may not always want to buy really expensive smartphones. You may need a secondary phone for additional use. Whether you want to use it as your main phone, your secondary handset or gift it to your loved ones, the Gfive U229 is a great choice. With a digital camera to take pictures and dual-SIM capability, this phone that comes with a 4.5-cm (1.8) display provides you with all the essential functions at an affordable price. Dual-SIM Slots You can keep your work-related calls separate from your personal number, thanks to this phone‚Äôs dual-SIM capability. Digital Camera Cherish your precious moments by taking pictures using the 0.3 MP rear and front camera. Battery It‚Äôs powered by a 950 mAh battery which allows you to use the functions and features of the phone. Power Saving Mode Conserve the charge on your battery using this mode which can be activated by clicking the ‚ÄúSettings>Phone Settings>Power Saving Mode‚Äù button. Bluetooth Connectivity Sharing your pictures, music, and videos is made easy with Bluetooth connectivity. LED Torch Light It also provides useful features such as the LED torch light which can be turned on by just long-pressing the ‚Äú0‚Äù button. Multiple Apps You can browse the internet and also use apps such as Facebook, Twitter, Yahoo, Ebuddy and more to stay connected to the world. Wireless FM Enjoy hands-free music via wireless FM and also from MP3 and MP4 files anytime and anywhere. Expandable Memory The expandable storage space of 8 GB lets you store your music, images, and videos by using an SD card.
